title: Stock Videos
description: Free and premium stock video footage for your projects. Download HD and 4K stock videos from Coverr, Mixkit, and other sources. Royalty-free video clips for commercial use in presentations, websites, and creative work.

resources.title: Coverr
resources.description: Completely free stock video footage for commercial and personal use. High-quality HD videos perfect for website backgrounds and hero sections.

resources.title: Mixkit
resources.description: Free stock videos, music tracks, sound effects, and video templates. All assets are commercially licensed and ready to use.
